FuncDef:
The mpls te entropy-label rsvp-te command configures the entropy label for global tunnels.
The undo mpls te entropy-label rsvp-te command deletes the entropy label for global tunnels.
By default, no entropy label is configured for global tunnels.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The entropy label is configured to address the severe load imbalance on a network. The entropy label capability is enabled on the egress for tunnels. An entropy label is set on the ingress. The mpls te entropy-label rsvp-te command is run to configure the entropy label for global tunnels to confirm the tunnel entropy label requirement, and the ingress sends the requirement to the forwarding plane for processing.
